The champions refused to be knocked off course by the elements or competitive opponents as superb strikes from Callum McGregor, Reo Hatate and [...]

articles.description: EXACTLY 59 years ago today, Johnny Divers accepted a pass from Joe McBride and drilled a shot behind Dundee United keeper Donald Mackay. It was the 15th minute of the opening league game of the 1965/66 season on August 25 1965 and it paved the way for a 4-0 victory at Tannadice. The strike from Divers [...]

articles.description: Any management team has only so much bandwidth.  You see the effect of this in organisations when the pressure is applied.  Urgent matters, the ones that come screaming into your inbox, or literally banging on your door, tend to take your focus. Strategically important issues seldom do this.  They can sit in the outfield for [...]
